original_text: but when evening comes, he shall bathe himself in water, and as the sun sets, he may come inside the camp.
korean_text: 해 질 때에 목욕하고 해 진 후에 진에 들어올 것이요

sentences.original_text: he shall bathe himself in water
he may come inside the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 진 안으로 들어올 수 있습니다
